title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Mix pasta with pancetta, remove from heat, then add egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt, then grill.
Cook onions and tomato puree until thick.
Add grilled chicken pieces and cook for 10 minutes.
